title: Error Handling in Express
content:
Module 4, Lesson 8: Error Handling in Express

Introduction

This lesson covers Error Handling in Express, a core topic in Node.js & Express: Backend Fundamentals. Mastering this area will help you build reliable, scalable, and maintainable web applications.

Key Concepts

1. Fundamentals

Understanding the foundational principles of Error Handling in Express ensures you can apply them correctly in a variety of real-world scenarios. Always prefer clarity over cleverness.

2. Practical Application

Theory must translate into working code. In Node.js & Express: Backend Fundamentals, every concept has direct practical implications for how you architect, test, and deploy applications.

3. Common Pitfalls

Awareness of common mistakes in Error Handling in Express helps you avoid costly bugs and security vulnerabilities. Review real-world examples and practise defensive coding techniques.

4. Best Practices

Industry best practices evolve constantly. Keep up with community standards, read production post-mortems, and participate in code reviews to sharpen your skills in Node.js & Express: Backend Fundamentals.

Summary

You have completed Error Handling in Express in Module 4. Continue to the next lesson to build further expertise in Node.js & Express: Backend Fundamentals.
